product_name: Swix R & R Performance Downhill Ski Poles - 2012 Closeout
long_description: With strong aluminum shafts made for recreational downhill skiing, the Swix R & R Performance downhill ski poles offer durability at a great value. Stout aluminum shafts have a stiff flex for good thrust during pole plants. Shaft diameters measure 18mm at the handle and 10mm at the basket. Adjustable straps lend support to your wrists, reducing fatigue. Standard baskets are designed for packed or hard snow. Closeout.
short_description: With strong aluminum shafts made for recreational downhill skiing, the Swix R & R Performance downhill ski poles offer durability at a great value.
